name: Romero Games
blurb: Romero Games makes FPS games. Across our team, we have shipped over 100 shooters in total, all in development roles, including the creation of six genre-defining IPs. We lean on a wealth of experience and love for FPS as a genre. Itâ€™s in our DNA, and our DNA is in FPS. We are a mature, independent game studio founded in 2014 by award-winning game developers Brenda and John Romero.
